Hello again, 
  I did check out the site you gave me. It helped me out a lot. I appreciated it greatly. I just have some problems with lasing the lames together. You said that this guy is on this list. Do you know what screen name he goes by? While I was on the site I e-mailed him and he still hasn't replied. Maybe you could help me with a easier way to learn how to lase the lames together. If you have any more info. it would greatly be appreciated. 
                                                                   Thank you again,
                                                                        Mark

Nate Ledbetter <ltdomer98@...> wrote:

--- depos42300 <depos42300@...> wrote:

> Hello, 
>   I put up a message about 3 days ago trying to get
> some help on 
> making samurai armour. Could someone please tell me
> where to start.
>                                   Thankx,
>                                    Mark

And I replied to you, and gave you a website, which
I'll do AGAIN. 

http://www.sengokudaimyo.com/katchu/index.html

The guy who put together the site is on this list, so
if you have any questions about the content, he can
answer them. This is probably the best source on the
web you'll find for "do it yourself" armor, if you
want to do it right. He's got other links and so forth
to peruse, also.
